divs: sighting detailsmy name is [name removed\cms\tg], and i'm like most people, they have been with me since i was a child. i've had daily sightings, and was abducted. i can comunicate with them, by them i mean the grays. now people have to understand that we are not alone, there are more people suffering from not knowing what's going on, and i'm here to help. i want people to write to me, i've kept this a secret for far too long, and now it's time to let everyone know the truth, and i don't really care what government guys get involved, it's way to big to be controlled. i can show anyone that writes the "orbs", and i've seen three of the triangles, nothing human can go that fast. i know how the grays became the way that they are, it's called enviermental mutaion, what will it be like for humans to have babys in space, what do you think space will do to us, without the sun or gravity. there's too much to say here so write, understanding bring peace, for for some the truth is hard...[email removed\cms\tg].
